abstract: Dallas Mavericks and forward Dirk Nowitzki reportedly reach two-year, $40 million contract agreement; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Nowitzki will have a chance to spend 20 seasons with the Dallas Mavericks, the only franchise he has ever played for.

headline.print_headline: Pro Basketball; Nowitzki Said to Be Staying With Mavericks
headline.main: Dirk Nowitzki and Mavericks Reportedly Reach Two-Year Agreement

snippet: Nowitzki will have a chance to spend 20 seasons with the Dallas Mavericks, the only franchise he has ever played for....
